info.description: MyOffice - a client-server system that provides document storage and collaborative editing capabilities

get.description: Returns the list of files. Results are filtered according to the data passed in the 'q' request parameter.

parameters.name: applicationName
parameters.description: Application name is used to filter recent files by their media type. When not specified, all files will be returned.

parameters.name: convert
parameters.description: Convert the file to the internal format

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: File metadata. parentId is required, filename and mediaType are optional

parameters.name: timezoneOffsetMins
parameters.description: Timezone to be used by Console Client

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Result file name. If not specified, default name will be set

post.description: Put files' ids to temporary store for future zip download.

get.description: Zip files specified in previous zip request.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Result file name. If not specified, default name will be set

put.description: Update file metadata. Currently used only for rename. Operation will be executed only if new filename is specified.

delete.description: Remove file or folder. If fileId equals trash folder id, purge trash.

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.description: Save file before download if it's opened

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Do not put file to recents

post.description: Copy file or create template from it.

parameters.name: timezoneOffsetMins
parameters.description: Timezone to be used by Console Client

post.description: Send file as a link or attachment.

parameters.name: timezoneOffsetMins
parameters.description: Timezone to be used by Console Client

get.description: Returns true if file is completely opened on DU with success.
Available only for a file in the user's tenant.

parameters.name: permId

parameters.description: Folder id where new file should be created

parameters.description: Title of revision. Title will be set for revision if present

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: File id to attach to the issue

parameters.name: clientParameters
parameters.description: Any parameters you want to store in the issue's description

parameters.name: timezoneOffsetMins

sendEmail.description: Send email after set permission or not indicator

userMessage.description: User message to add in email

source.description: The content type to convert from.

targets.description: The possible content types to convert to.

checksum.description: An MD5 checksum for the content of this file.

createdDate.description: Create time for this file (formatted ISO8601 timestamp).

creator.description: The original creator (userId) of this file.

description.description: A short description of the file.

etag.description: ETag (HTTP Entity Tag) of the file.

fileSize.description: The size of the file in bytes.

filename.description: The original filename of the file that was uploaded, imported and converted to the storage.

headRevisionId.description: The ID of the file's head (last) revision.

isRoot.description: Whether or not the parent is the root folder.

lastModifyingUserId.description: The last userId to modify this file.

lastViewedByMeDate.description: Last time this file was viewed by the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

mediaType.description: The media type of the file.

modifiedByMeDate.description: Last time this file was modified by the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

modifiedDate.description: Last time this file was modified by anyone (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

originalFile.description: The original file id for thumbnail.

originalMediaType.description: The original media type of the file that was uploaded, imported and converted to the storage.

ownerId.description: The owner's login of this file.

parentId.description: The parent folder (parentReferenceId) which contains this file. The root has no parent

previewFailureMark.description: Flag to show unix time of unsuccessful preview generation.

quotaBytesUsed.description: The number of quota bytes used by this file.

sharedWithMeDate.description: Time at which this file was shared with the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

thumbnailFailureMark.description: Flag to show unix time of unsuccessful thumbnail generation.

tree.description: Parents' tree for file. Can be different for shared files

sourceExtensions.description: The imported file's extensions to convert from.

sourceMediaTypes.description: The imported file's content types to convert from.

target.description: The content type to convert to.

features.description: List of additional features enabled on this account.

maxUploadSizes.description: List of max upload sizes for each file type. The most specific type takes precedence.

roots.description: The list of root folders (typically Shared, Trash and Personal).

Info.title: Info
Info.description: The generic information regarding this user account.

size.description: The max upload size for this type.

email.description: The user's email for this permission.

fsPermId.description: The FS ID of the permission (user id or group id if it's a group permission).

groupName.description: Group name (will be empty if it is not a group permission, not required to add permission)

id.description: The ID of the permission (user login or group id if it's a group permission).

login.description: The user's login for this permission.

role.description: The primary role for this user.

visibility.description: The visibility scope of this property.

Property.title: Property
Property.description: A key-value pair with a specified visibility scope.

checksum.description: An MD5 checksum for the content of this revision.

createdDate.description: Create time for this file (formatted ISO8601 timestamp).

fileSize.description: The size of the revision in bytes.

mediaType.description: The media type of the revision.

modifiedDate.description: Last time this revision was modified (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).
